languages.english-overview:
OSClass is all you need to easily create your own classifieds website.
It's a free and open script to create your advertisement or listings site.
OSClass is released under the Apache License 2.0.
languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_username: Please provide the username to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_user: The Admin username is incorrect and does not exist!
